ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 316
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone checked the clockworks in Overthere for new recipe books? I haven t, as they won t sell to me currently, but will after I trade in some more of
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone checked the clockworks in Overthere for new recipe books?

I haven't, as they won't sell to me currently, but will after I trade in
some
more of those dagnam berserker whip thingies.

Ghirardelli
50 necro
E'ci

From: "Quasinom de Plume" <eqmailing@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 19, 2000 12:55 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 316
